Open TickTick app and share the wedding plan task on dwbscratchid3@google.com through Gmail

Open App: TickTick
Click on button with the text "Weeding plan"
Click on point (1021,201)
Click on point (407,1399)
Click on point (447,2216)
Click on button with the text "Copy Link"
Click on point (355,2247)
Wait for response
Click on point (135,2159)
Click on point (537,517)
Type text: Dwbscratchid3@google.com
Click on button with the text "Send"
Check status: successful

create a new html file with the i.html using the '+' button in the webcode app.

Click on button with the function of "Menu"
Click on point (71,371)
Click on button with the text "Html file"
Click on button with the text "Name"
Type text: i
Click on button with the text "Create"
Check status: successful

 I will filter my task of buying hiking boots and camping gear by the due date of November 18 in the TickTick app.

Click on point (995,206)
Click on button with the text "Sort"
Click on button with the text "Date"
Go back to the previous page
Check status: successful

Write Carlos an email at Carlos3345@gmail.com with the title "Thank you for the Gift" saying that the brother appreciated all the items you sent, especially the sports equipment for inspiration.

Open App: Gmail
Click on button with the text "Compose"
Type text: Carlos3345@gmail.com
Click on button with the text "Carlos3345@gmail.com"
Click on button with the text "Subject"
Type text: Thank you for the Gift
Click on point (309,935)
Type text: The brother appreciated all the items you sent, especially the sports equipment for inspiration
Click on button with the text "Send"
Check status: successful
